name: Tomago's fruit market
description:
Greetings from BEARROOT.

Game for HedgeJam #4.

First try at a game jam for us.

A small cute game about Tomago selling fruit to customers, match a minimum of 3 fruits to satisfy your customers before the time runs out! 

Controls:

Use left click and drag the fruit to switch positions.

We want to continue working on this game, for now this is a small prototype.
